ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the ABN is only 11 digits for Customer type only. SC May2019 - Reactivated rule as per Alice Lo request PS Aug 2019 REQ1919573 - added Sys adm to exclude from rule
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && NOT(AND(ISNUMBER( ABN__c ), LEN(ABN__c) = 11)) && NOT(ISBLANK( ABN__c )) , true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid ABN of 11 digits without any spaces.
